product.title: Lintu Dandelion Roman Blind
product.description: Youd be hard-pressed to find a more beautiful mingling of charm and modern design than the lintu dandelion roman blind. The palette is crisp and stylish, the brightness of the yellow a stunning contrast to the grey and neutral tones that make the blind look so smart.

relproducts.title: Woven Acorn Cup Dandelion Roman Blind
relproducts.description: This popular woven acorn cup design from their orla kiely collection will add some 'pop' to your decor. relproducts.title: Burdock Dandelion - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The burdock in dandelion certainly earns its name, showing deep dandelion yellows and oranges across a rich canvas of burdock imagery. The end result is a sunny and cheerful one, and hanging this blind in your home is sure to brighten up any room. Enhance a sunroom that catches the light by using the dandelion as a secondary source of sunny yellow. Keep surrounding walls pale, in off-white, ivory, or cream, and use either the yellow or orange tone from the blind to inspire your accessories throughout the rest of the room.
